title: Wellbeing-Integrated Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and secondary education level
context.additional_context: Need for a personalized curriculum integrating language proficiency enhancement and wellness education in smartphone-enabled learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three practical strategies for stress management and emotional stability through language activities.
Learners can complete language tasks (discussions, presentations, writing) with over 80% completion rate by applying well-being-integrated learning design.
Learners can suggest at least two language learning methods that foster a well-being environment through peer feedback and self-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
